name: Project Sub - The Deep Sea Cave
name_original: Project Sub - The Deep Sea Cave
description:
Project Sub - The Deep Sea Cave

This underwater adventure will take you through caverns deep within the ocean. Be the first to explore the deep, but beware the treacherous cave walls and floating debris which will destroy your Sub!
Game includes seven levels. YES, SEVEN! Good luck getting through ;)

Controls:

A - rotate left
D - rotate right
Space- thrust
S - reverse thrust

Please comment and share! All feedback appreciated
